name: @meeshy/shared
description: Shared types, schemas, and protocols for Meeshy microservices

scripts.build: pnpm run generate && pnpm run build:types && pnpm run distribute
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist/ generated/ node_modules/ && find . -name '*.js' -not -path './node_modules/*' -not -path './prisma/client/*' -delete && find . -name '*.map' -not -path './node_modules/*' -not -path './prisma/client/*' -delete
